title: Blood Brothers - Burn Piano Island, Burn
description:
...Burn, Piano Island, Burn is the third full-length studio album by the American mathcore band The Blood Brothers, released in March 2003. Produced by Ross Robinson, the album was recorded over two months with a roughly $25,000 budget [6] and serves as the band's first major label album, bringing them the attention of the mainstream media. The album drew much critical praise earning a score of 82 on metacritic,[7] and is considered by many to be their finest effort. -from Wikipedia
